meanings.definition: The quality or state of being deep in extent or measurement.
meanings.sent1: The deepnesses of the ocean amazed the divers.
meanings.sent2: The deepnesses of the cave made it challenging to explore.
meanings.sent3: Her fascination with the deepnesses of space led her to become an astronaut.
meanings.sent4: The deepnesses of his thoughts were like an endless abyss.
meanings.sent5: The deepnesses of the canyon were breathtaking to behold.

meanings.definition: The extent or measurement of something from top to bottom.
meanings.sent1: The deepnesses of the well were unknown to the villagers.
meanings.sent2: The deepnesses of the pool were perfect for diving competitions.
meanings.sent3: The deepnesses of the cake surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The deepnesses of the mine seemed to go on forever.
meanings.sent5: The deepnesses of the tree roots reached far into the ground.

meanings.definition: The distance from the surface to the bottom of a body of water.
meanings.sent1: The deepnesses of the lake were ideal for fishing.
meanings.sent2: The deepnesses of the pond were home to many fish.
meanings.sent3: The deepnesses of the bathtub made it perfect for a relaxing soak.
meanings.sent4: The deepnesses of the river were explored by adventurous swimmers.
meanings.sent5: The deepnesses of the ocean floor held many mysteries.

meanings.definition: The intensity or profundity of a feeling or emotion.
meanings.sent1: The deepnesses of her love for him were evident in her eyes.
meanings.sent2: The deepnesses of his sorrow could be felt by all who knew him.
meanings.sent3: The deepnesses of his hunger for success drove him to work hard.
meanings.sent4: The deepnesses of her joy at the news were contagious.
meanings.sent5: The deepnesses of his fear paralyzed him in the dark.
